name: GetZoomDeviceManagerGroupInfo
description:
Retrieve Zoom Device Manager group information for an account.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about Zoom Device Manager groups associated with an account. Useful for administrators needing insight into device group configurations.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: The total number of records to return per API call. Default is 30, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description:
The total number of records returned from a single API call.
Default - 30.
Max -100.

parameters.name: pagination_next_page_token
parameters.description: Token to retrieve the next set of results for paginated Zoom Device Manager group data. Valid for 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period token is 15 minutes.
